'''Mark Bankston''' is an attorney at [http://fbtrial.com/ Farrar & Ball LLP]<ref>http://fbtrial.com/attorneys/mark-bankston/</ref> and lead counsel for [[Texas Sandy Hook Lawsuit (Heslin v. Jones)|TX Sandy Hook Case]]. He is also counsel for the [[Texas Parkland Shooting Lawsuit (Fontaine v. Jones)|Fontaine case]]. He has worked closely with [[Bill Ogden]] on all the InfoWars related defamation cases in Texas.

Mark has appeared on Knowledge Fight as a guest a number of times, including on Episodes [[602: Sandy Hook Response|602]], [[618: November 15, 2021|618]], and [[641: Formulaic Objections Part 4|641]].
